divs: Sighting Details At 11:14 pm we shut off the lights to go to bed and my husband noticed a blinking light in the southeast sky that was hovering. We watched it for a few minutes and then I got up to get a better look. It is fairly high up and appears round with fast moving red and green lights that resemble an arrow shape and move in the same pattern repeatedly. As of 12:42 am it is still there.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Plymouth
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Noticed blinking object in sky @ 23:14. As of 1.5 hrs later still hovering w.triangle shaped lights in pattern.
